title: Strategy
data:
One of the uses of [NetHackWiki](/wiki/NetHackWiki "NetHackWiki") is to document the **strategy** that [adventurers](/wiki/Adventurer "Adventurer") are using to survive *[NetHack](/wiki/NetHack "NetHack")*.

- [Category:Strategy](/wiki/Category:Strategy "Category:Strategy") contains a list of NetHackWiki articles classified as strategy.
- Stumped? You can also ask for help on the [forum](/wiki/Forum:Watercooler "Forum:Watercooler").

The list of strategies on this page can include "red links" to missing wiki pages. Feel free to remove any red links if you can replace them with links to suitable pages.

## List of strategies

- Beginning the game

  - [Role difficulty](/wiki/Role_difficulty "Role difficulty"): Which role is easiest? Hardest?
  - The [standard strategy](/wiki/Standard_strategy "Standard strategy"): How to beat the game
  - [Why do I keep dying?](/wiki/Why_do_I_keep_dying%3F "Why do I keep dying?"): Common misconceptions
  - [Notetaking](/wiki/Notetaking "Notetaking"): effectively tracking in-game information

- General tactics

  - [Movement tactics](/wiki/Movement_tactics "Movement tactics")

    - [Boulder](/wiki/Boulder "Boulder") as [corridor](/wiki/Corridor "Corridor") plug
    - [Boulder fort](/wiki/Boulder_fort "Boulder fort")

  - [Hunger](/wiki/Hunger "Hunger"), [nutrition](/wiki/Nutrition "Nutrition"), and not dying of [starvation](/wiki/Starvation "Starvation")

  - [Sickness](/wiki/Sickness "Sickness") and curing oneself

  - [Weapon skill](/wiki/Skill "Skill"): How to #[enhance](/wiki/Enhance "Enhance")

  - [Sectarian tactics](/wiki/Religion "Religion")

    - [Sacrifice](/wiki/Sacrifice "Sacrifice"): How to #[offer](/wiki/Offer "Offer")
    - [Curse](/wiki/Curse "Curse") avoidance, typically via [pet](/wiki/Pet "Pet") accumulation or membership in the [priesthood](/wiki/Priest "Priest")

  - [Fountains](/wiki/Fountain "Fountain") and [sinks](/wiki/Sink "Sink"): Ignore them? Curse avoidance, above, a strong incentive for doing so.

- Managing items

  - [Ascension kit](/wiki/Ascension_kit "Ascension kit")
  - [Potion strategy](/wiki/Potion_strategy "Potion strategy"): Which to keep, which to dilute
  - [Scroll strategy](/wiki/Scroll_strategy "Scroll strategy"): Which to keep, which to blank
  - [Wand strategy](/wiki/Wand_strategy "Wand strategy"): Which are worth lugging around
  - [Repertoire](/wiki/Spellcasting "Spellcasting") and [literacy](/wiki/Illiterate "Illiterate") strategy, perhaps also practising [amnesia](/wiki/Amnesia "Amnesia")-avoidance
  - [Ring strategy](/wiki/Ring_strategy "Ring strategy")
  - [Making a stash](/wiki/Stash "Stash")
  - [Wishing](/wiki/Wish "Wish"): What to wish for

- Using shops

  - [Credit cloning](/wiki/Credit_cloning "Credit cloning")
  - [Price identification](/wiki/Price_identification "Price identification")
  - [Stealing from shops](/wiki/Stealing_from_shops "Stealing from shops")

- Advanced strategies

  - [Cancellation](/wiki/Cancellation "Cancellation")
  - [Digging for victory](/wiki/Digging_for_victory "Digging for victory")
  - [Gehennom mapping](/wiki/Gehennom_mapping "Gehennom mapping")
  - [Genocide](/wiki/Genocide "Genocide")
  - [Nurse dancing](/wiki/Nurse_dancing "Nurse dancing")
  - [Polymorph](/wiki/Polymorph "Polymorph") and [polypiling](/wiki/Polypiling "Polypiling")
  - [Protection racket](/wiki/Protection_racket "Protection racket")
  - [Drain for gain](/wiki/Drain_for_gain "Drain for gain")
  - [Teleportation](/wiki/Teleportation "Teleportation"): Teleporting enemies away is often used on the [Astral Plane](/wiki/Astral_Plane "Astral Plane")

- In Extremis
  - [Things To Do If You're Going to Die Next Turn](/wiki/Things_To_Do_If_You%27re_Going_to_Die_Next_Turn "Things To Do If You're Going to Die Next Turn")

[![This article may require revision for the next version of NetHack. Click here for more information.](/images/b/b0/Nh343-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "This article may require revision for the next version of NetHack. Click here for more information.")

**This page may need to be updated for the [current version](/wiki/Current_version "Current version") of *NetHack*.**

It may contain text specific to [NetHack 3.4.3](/wiki/NetHack_3.4.3 "NetHack 3.4.3"). Information on this page may be out of date.

**Editors:** After reviewing this page and making necessary edits, please change the {{nethack-343}} tag to the current version's tag or {{noversion}} as appropriate.
html:
Strategy

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search

One of the uses of NetHackWiki is to document the strategy that adventurers are using to survive NetHack.

  • Category:Strategy contains a list of NetHackWiki articles classified as strategy.
  • Stumped? You can also ask for help on the forum.

The list of strategies on this page can include "red links" to missing wiki pages. Feel free to remove any red links if you can replace them with links to suitable pages.

List of strategies

  • Beginning the game
    • Role difficulty: Which role is easiest? Hardest?
    • The standard strategy: How to beat the game
    • Why do I keep dying?: Common misconceptions
    • Notetaking: effectively tracking in-game information
  • General tactics
    • Movement tactics
      • Boulder as corridor plug
      • Boulder fort
    • Hunger, nutrition, and not dying of starvation
    • Sickness and curing oneself
    • Weapon skill: How to #enhance
    • Sectarian tactics
      • Sacrifice: How to #offer
      • Curse avoidance, typically via pet accumulation or membership in the priesthood
    • Fountains and sinks: Ignore them? Curse avoidance, above, a strong incentive for doing so.
  • Managing items
    • Ascension kit
    • Potion strategy: Which to keep, which to dilute
    • Scroll strategy: Which to keep, which to blank
    • Wand strategy: Which are worth lugging around
    • Repertoire and literacy strategy, perhaps also practising amnesia-avoidance
    • Ring strategy
    • Making a stash
    • Wishing: What to wish for
  • Using shops
    • Credit cloning
    • Price identification
    • Stealing from shops
  • Advanced strategies
    • Cancellation
    • Digging for victory
    • Gehennom mapping
    • Genocide
    • Nurse dancing
    • Polymorph and polypiling
    • Protection racket
    • Drain for gain
    • Teleportation: Teleporting enemies away is often used on the Astral Plane
  • In Extremis
    • Things To Do If You're Going to Die Next Turn

This page may need to be updated for the current version of NetHack.

It may contain text specific to NetHack 3.4.3. Information on this page may be out of date.

Editors: After reviewing this page and making necessary edits, please change the {{nethack-343}} tag to the current version's tag or {{noversion}} as appropriate.

Retrieved from "https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Strategy&oldid=127451"

One of the uses of [[NetHackWiki]] is to document the '''strategy''' that [[adventurer]]s are using to survive ''[[NetHack]]''.

*[[:Category:Strategy]] contains a list of NetHackWiki articles classified as strategy.
*Stumped? You can also ask for help on the [[Forum:Watercooler|forum]].

The list of strategies on this page can include "red links" to missing wiki pages. Feel free to remove any red links if you can replace them with links to suitable pages.
